exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

exceptions.tactic: apply transitivity with (all_increasing x n m H2); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.

original: apply Build_IncreasingSeparationAlgebra. intros x n n' H. destruct H as [m [H1 H2]]. apply transitivity with (all_increasing x n m H2); auto.
